import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Meal(_ref){let{meal}=_ref;const[imageUrl,setImageURL]=useState('');const[nutrientsData,setNutrientsData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_API;fetch(`https://api.spoonacular.com/recipes/${meal.id}/information?apiKey=${API_KEY}&includeNutrition=true`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{var _data$nutrition;setImageURL(data.image);setNutrientsData((_data$nutrition=data.nutrition)===null||_data$nutrition===void 0?void 0:_data$nutrition.nutrients);}).catch(()=>{console.log("error");});},[meal.id]);// Find fat and protein values from nutrition data
